content: www boo-biloo blogspot co uk materials cuff 1 x 100g ball schoppel-wole crazy zauberball 4ply cast on 60 64 68 sts col 2254 join to work in the round being careful not to twist place marker to show the beginning of the round needles round 1 k2 p2 repeat to end 2 5mm us1½ 23cm circular needle or dpns or size work this round 17 more times needed to obtain gauge tapestry needle leg - right sock stitch markers instructions between * are the pattern insert round 1 k6 *p2 k2 k2tog k2 yo p2* knit to end of round gauge round 2 k6 *p2 k5 k1tbl p2* knit to end of round 32 sts and 48 row to 10cm/4inch in stocking stitch round 3 k6 *p2 k1 k2tog k2 yo k1 p2* knit to end of round size round 4 k6 *p2 k4 k1tbl k1 p2* knit to end of round s m l round 5 k6 *p2 k2tog k2 yo k2 p2* knit to end of round 20 5 23 25 5 cm round 6 k6 *p2 k3 k1tbl k2 p2* knit to end of round 8 9 10 in round 7-10 k6 *p2 k6 p2* knit to end of round abbreviations work these 10 rounds 5 5 6 more times or to desired st s stitches length ending on row 10 k knit p purl k2tog knit 2 stitches together p2tog purl 2 stitches together leg - left sock ssk slip slip knit 2 stitches together instructions between * are the pattern insert wyif with yarn in front for yo on the left sock take yarn to front over top of wyib with yarn in back needle around needle and back between needles sl1 slip 1 round 1 k14 16 18 *p2 yo k2 ssk k2 p2* knit to end k1tbl knit through back loop of round yo yarn over round 2 k14 16 18 *p2 k6 p2* knit to end of round round 3 k14 16 18 *p2 k1 yo k2 ssk k1 p2* knit to ---------------------------------------------- end of round round 4 k14 16 18 *p2 k6 p2* knit to end of round round 5 k14 16 18 *p2 k2 yo k2 ssk p2* knit to end right sock insert chart key of round round 6-10 k14 16 18 *p2 k6 p2* knit to end of round - knit work these 10 rounds 5 5 6 more times or to desired length ending on row 10 - purl heel flap - k1tbl turn work so ws is facing heel flap will now be worked back and forth on the - yo next 30 32 34 sts begin with a ws row keep remaining 30 32 34 sts on hold for instep - ssk row 1 ws sl1 wyif p29 31 33 row 2 rs sl1 wyib k1 to last st k1 - k2tog work these 2 row 13 14 15 more times then work row 1 once more turn heel row 1 rs sl1 wyib k16
